[Message from Captain Vishotsky]
Congratulations on achieving level 58. I am Captain Vishotsky of the Town of Schuttgart.I have heard a great deal about your recent activities. It is said that you are quite an accomplished adventurer. I send this message because it is time you knew about Kamaloka and its hideously mutated monsters, the Kaneuses. If you have both strength and courage, come see me immediately. I will await your arrival.
